description.zh: 全球领先的媒体和消费者洞察公司，提供电视收视率、广告效果、消费者行为数据
description.en: Global leader in media and consumer insights, providing TV ratings, advertising effectiveness, consumer behavior data

authority_justification.zh: 成立于 1923 年，电视收视率的行业标准制定者，被全球广告主和媒体公司采用
authority_justification.en: Founded in 1923, industry standard setter for TV ratings, adopted by global advertisers and media companies
